about_the_game:
This game provides players with a simple yet highly attractive stress relieving experience.

Players need to manipulate blocks to avoid constantly approaching balls.

In minimalist and modern interfaces, players use the a and D keys to control the left and right movement of blocks. The background adopts cool tones to create a peaceful and relaxing atmosphere. When the ball is launched and bounced, players need to accurately calculate their position to effectively avoid it. Every success increases the player's gaming experience, fun, and satisfaction. This is not only a game that tests players' reaction speed and hand eye coordination ability, but also a perfect relaxation tool suitable for any moment when they need to temporarily get rid of daily stress.

name: Evaluate

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11 x64
  • Processor: i5 3550 / FX-8350
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660Ti 3GB / R9 270X 4GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
